attributes.action: Shoe shops to stock large sizes
attributes.additional_details: I think it unfair that those with larger feet suffer from shoe shops not stocking footwear suitable for them. More and more men and women are finding themselves unable to purchase shoes in-store and have to face higher prices and limited choice online. Shoe shops may be saving themselves money by not stocking sizes above 12 and 9  for men and women respectively, but I believe the government should take action and negotiate with footwear retailers.
